content.question: The development of the railroads as described in the excerpt had which of the following effects on westward expansion in the late 1800s?

choices.label: Merchants mobilized politically to resist transportation expansion.
New commercial centers and communities emerged along rail lines.
Governments exerted increased control over transportation industries.
New immigrants mostly settled on western farms along rail lines.

content.answer: New commercial centers and communities emerged along rail lines.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
